description: Numbers that are not the sum of 3 distinct squares.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: r[n_] := Reduce[0 <= x < y < z && x^2 + y^2 + z^2 == n, {x, y, z}, Integers]; ok[n_] := r[n] == False; Select[ Range[112], ok] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Dec 05 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
